io.github.mrblobman.nbt

Interface NBTIODelegate<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the data this delegate can forward the operations to.

    public interface NBTIODelegate<T>
    This class provides read, write and append operations for the NBT data of an object of the type T.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void append(T item, NBTCompoundTag tag)
      Add all of the mappings in the tag to the item.
      NBTCompoundTag read(T item)
      Read the NBT data from the item.
      void write(T item, NBTCompoundTag tag)
      Write the given tag to the item.

    • Method Detail

      • read

        NBTCompoundTag read(T item)
        Read the NBT data from the item.
        Parameters:
        item - the item who's data is being read
        Returns:
        an NBTCompoundTag with the item's NBT data

      • write

        void write(T item,
           NBTCompoundTag tag)
        Write the given tag to the item. This completely overwrites the items old data with this tag. See append(Object, NBTCompoundTag) if you would only like to add new tags or overwrite just the tags in the compound.
        Parameters:
        item - the item that the data is being written to
        tag - the data to write to the item

      • append

        void append(T item,
            NBTCompoundTag tag)
        Add all of the mappings in the tag to the item. This will only overwrite things that appear in the given tag leaving the other elements in the existing tag alone.
        Parameters:
        item - the item that the data is being written to
        tag - the data to append to the item
